channel.title: Train Mind
channel.itunes:author: Aureliano Nava
channel.itunes:summary: What does secular Dharma and/or secular Buddhism look like? Can we have both the wisdom of Buddhism that has taken decades to develop while not adopting the religious and cultural aspects?

item.title: Anthony Bourdain and Ourselves
item.itunes:author: Aureliano Nava
item.itunes:subtitle: Fearless in Depression
